name: exteriorly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
on or from the outside: It was agreed that the new houses would be completed at least exteriorly. The tower featured an exteriorly projecting niche, within which stood a small statue.
More examplesFewer examplesThere were some serious faults with the building, but none of them were visible exteriorly.The control panel is positioned exteriorly on the pump and is protected by a hood.She did a good job of looking confident exteriorly, even though she was extremely nervous.
